places_with_reviews.name: Piyush Inn
address: Mondha Rd, Prashant Nagar, Morewadi, Ambajogai, Maharashtra 431517, India

reviews.text: Surprisingly good hotel for a small town. The room and washroom were clean. The bed and covers were spotless. The Air conditioner was adequate for us but might not be for some. The food was great and taste was very much to our liking.

We were coming back to Mumbai after Parli vaijnath darshan and were not getting good hotel in Parli . Finally found  hotel Piyush inn in Ambajogai .Getting such hotel in such a small town was big surprise.Room size was not very spacious but clean , bed sheet were clean white . Air conditioning was excellent, wash room was very  clean. It also has restaurant in ground floor. Also staff were humble and soft spoken. Overall, We had good experience .

Good hotel in Ambejogai city which is centrally located.
Rooms are good, neat and clean just room size is small even washrooms are also very clean
They have parking space for cars and 2 wheelers
Breakfast options are also good and taste is good

Located at just a kilometer away from the main mandir, Piyush Inn is a beautiful stay. The staff was friendly, the room service was great and food was excellent. Definitely recommend it at a very good cost. Forwarded the word to all my relatives taking a trip to Ambajogai.
Very cooperative staff Akshay and Pooja very disciplined and good behavior restaurant food very good cleanliness very good

preprocessed_reviews: surprisingly good hotel small town room washroom clean bed covers spotless air conditioner adequate us might food great taste much liking

coming back mumbai parli vaijnath darshan getting good hotel parli finally found hotel piyush inn ambajogai getting hotel small town big surpriseroom size spacious clean bed sheet clean white air conditioning excellent wash room clean also restaurant ground floor also staff humble soft spoken overall good experience
good hotel ambejogai city centrally located rooms good neat clean room size small even washrooms also clean parking space cars wheelers breakfast options also good taste good
located kilometer away main mandir piyush inn beautiful stay staff friendly room service great food excellent definitely recommend good cost forwarded word relatives taking trip ambajogai
cooperative staff akshay pooja disciplined good behavior restaurant food good cleanliness good

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Sai Palace
address: Ambedkar Chowk, Parli - Ambajogai Rd,Chousalkar Colony, P9HW+VGX Sawta Mali Chowk, Anand Nagar, Ambajogai, Ambajogai Rural, Maharashtra 431517, India

reviews.text: This is good hotel for the vegetarian people. While searching for the vegetarian restaurant this is the good hotel for the all vegan people. This is good 💯😊 for the all types of program like birthday, engagement, small wedding, get together, bc, bachlors party and the many more function. This is quite friendly for all the people. Service and the all staff are too supportive while we are celebrating birthdays and anniversaries they are supportive for the our function. There is good space for the 30 people approximately. Food also too good in test . Worth it visit to the hotel. And the rooms and the area are also too much good and the view from the rooms are also good 👍😊 must visit to this hotel

Sai Palace is a comfortable and affordable hotel for the entire family. The rooms are neat and clean with very basic amenities. Hot water can be an issue as well as TV since they have only free channels.

The staff is very polite and will help you 24/7. The hotel has inhouse restaurant which serves pure veg food which is very delicious.

Located in the heart of Ambejogai, Sai Palace is the perfect accommodation choice for those embarking on a spiritual journey to the revered Yogeshwari temple. The hotel's proximity to the temple ensures easy access for devotees seeking a tranquil retreat.

Upon entering Sai Palace, guests are greeted with a sense of warmth and hospitality. The lobby exudes a welcoming ambiance, setting the tone for a pleasant stay. The staff members are courteous and attentive, ensuring that guests' needs are met promptly.

The rooms at Sai Palace are a haven of comfort and cleanliness. Each room is meticulously maintained, offering a serene environment for relaxation after a day of spiritual exploration. The beds are adorned with crisp linens, guaranteeing a restful night's sleep. Additionally, all necessary amenities are provided to ensure guests' convenience throughout their stay.

One of the highlights of Sai Palace is its proximity to the Yogeshwari temple. Guests can easily walk to the temple, immersing themselves in the spiritual aura that surrounds it. Whether attending a morning prayer ceremony or participating in evening rituals, guests can experience the sanctity of the temple at their leisure.

After a day of spiritual rejuvenation, guests can indulge in delicious meals at the hotel's onsite restaurant. The menu features a variety of local and international dishes, prepared with fresh ingredients and served with care. Whether enjoying a hearty breakfast before heading to the temple or savoring a leisurely dinner with loved ones, guests are sure to delight in the culinary offerings at Sai Palace.

In conclusion, Sai Palace Ambejogai offers a delightful blend of comfort, convenience, and spirituality. With its clean and tidy rooms, attentive staff, and proximity to the Yogeshwari temple, it is the ideal choice for travelers seeking a memorable and enriching experience in Ambejogai.

Rooms are clean and hygienic, specially considering the cost.Service and hospitality are very good.Food- breakfast poori bhaji, aloo paratha were very good, dinner- dal khichadi, paneer65, tomato soup were good.Chinese hakka noodles and veg biryani were average.
Definitely a place one should opt for when in Ambajogai

Good Rooms are clean and hygienic, specially considering the cost.Service and hospitality are very good.Food- breakfast poori bhaji, aloo paratha were very good, dinner- dal khichadi, paneer65, tomato soup were good.Chinese hakka noodles and veg biryani were average.
Definitely a place one should opt for when in अंबाजोगाई If anybody looking for clean and healthy atmosphere in hotel then plz visit this hotel. There is  anniversary celebration of my uncle and aunt wonderful✨😍 celebration had done there  we had ate palak puri, paneer pulao, gulab jamun, pudina chutney, and potato 🥦🥕🌽Veggies overall hotel is so good and atmosphere is nice

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Raj
address: Sawarkar chowk, near bus stand, Prashant Nagar, Jaywanti Nagar, Ambajogai, Ambajogai Rural, Maharashtra 431517, India

reviews.text: Be Aware and take Safety precautions before u leave your room without bags...  Carry your bags and all always when u go outside; because When I was go outside then come back I feel someone checked my bag and Room, So be aware for this.

Overall experience was really nice. Would love to come back.
1. Rooms ware clean and specious.
2. Service is very prompt and staff is very kind and helpful.
3. Hot water is available 24 hours
4. Hotel is just next to Bus stand.
5.Car parking available.

Area of improvement :
1. Hotel toiletries could be provided before time.
2. Lighting in lobby could be improved.
3. Kettle and tea/coffee could be provided in the room

I had a great experience in this hotel during my first visit. I would like to share that staff in this hotel were very  friendly and helpful. The rooms clean and well maintained. I would really like to thanks to the staff and management for making my stay memorable. I would again like to visit and stay here during my next visit planned in May 2024..
It is a very nice and peaceful place. rooms and service are likely good. there staff is also supportive I am very impress after visiting here.

the hotel, staff and services ever excellent
Enjoyed my stay here
Would love to come back again
Thank you
Deepanshu

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Parichay
address: Parli - Ambajogai Rd, Ambajogai, Shepwadi, Maharashtra 431517, India

reviews.text:
Nice place to stay.
Well maintained Hygiene and cooperative staff.

Rooms are good but service needs improvement. Need to tell that person at reception is good but other staff not at all supportive. No running hot water. Hot water not available till 6:30. Person staying in highway hotel will start onwards journey early till that time no service available. Not even regular drinking water is provided

Courteous staff, excellent rooms, ample parking, best vegetarian food available..
What else do you need in religious tourism?! Highly recommended..
Food quality quite good.excellent service. Rates are reasonable. ..

Room was nice. Bed is comfortable with good Linen. But AC was not at all working properly inspite of booking AC room. No water in Wash basin tap . We raised the complain to hotel staff and manager but the issue wasn't resolved. Lunch options were good but breakfast was a big disappointment. We had told a night in advance but still it wasn't ready. Location of the hotel is perfect as it's very much accessible to Parali Vaijanath (approx 20 minutes) and Ambejogai Mandir (5/10 minutes). If these minor complaints are taken care of than it's definitely a good place to stay. Rates are reasonable.

courteous staff excellent rooms ample parking best vegetarian food available else need religious tourism highly recommended

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Eat N Stay
address: Dada complex, opp. Mondha, Main Road, Ambajogai, Maharashtra 431517, India

reviews.text: It's not a hotel, dharmshalas and bhakt nivas are giving better facilities, no hot water on the entire floor and as a result the entire floor asked to take a bath in one and only room where it is working. Extra mattress given but nothing to cover it, average hygienic toilet. No proper parking
Worst place stay!! Stay away from this hotel.

The location is almost central, very close to Yogeshawari temple. The staff/management is very polite and accommodative. The rooms are good value for money though don't expect too much from the restaurant, they have a large menu but the taste is average. Don't opt for breakfast.

Economy Hotel in Town . Hotel having it's own vegetarian restaurant.  Food quality is average.  No parking area is available for your car. Hotel have no reception area. Staff is local and untrained.  Good for solo or batchelor travelers.  Not for family and solo women travelers.  Location is good. Please try to book through GOibibo first  , makemytrip and last OYO. Please do your booking online.  It will cost around  600 to 1000/- . Hotel have surrounded by SBI and Bank of baroda ATM. Don't opt for breakfast during the booking.  Breakfast is limited and not up to the mark.
Hotel is lodge but good, but not parking available and there workers boy very 3rd class service, very cheap. Don't go.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Krushnai
address: Opp.Reliance Petrol Pump,Ambedkar Chowk, Ambedkar Chowk, Parli Rd, opp. Reliance Petrol Pump, Jaywanti Nagar, Ambajogai, Ambajogai Rural, Maharashtra 431517, India

reviews.text: Good for family trip - clean - 24 hours hot water - affordable rates

At walkable distance from bus stand. They have restaurant which has the good quality food. Staff is cooperative. Rooms are recently repainted. Hot water is available, only minus is the washroom which requires upgradation and need to maintain the cleanliness.

Yesterday I stayed at this hotel. The service is very good also this hotel.is having dining facility. This is pure veg restrorent. The lodging is very good facility for stay. Good clean rooms well maintained also provide the additional beds if required. Room. size is also very good and huge. The dining hall needs some improvement. The hotel is clean but when I sit for snacks I found cockroaches moving on each tables this needs to be take care. Food quality is not up to the mark.
Entire hotel needs to renovate.  Lift is very old stops working some time. Bathroom fitting is in very nad shape. Even bucket is not cleaned properly.

The food was good. The room service was not good. The fan was not working, it worked only on number 5. Air conditioning was also not that powerful. Also, the weird thing about this hotel was there was no commode in non-ac room. If there are any elderly people with you you'll have to take an AC room to have a commode in it.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Radheshyam Inn हॉटेल राधेश्याम ईन
address: Hotel Radheshyam Inn, 2nd Floor, R.R. Complex, mandi bazar Road, near, Yogeshwari Mandir Marg, above Shreehari Sari Depo, Mandi Bazaar, Ambajogai, Maharashtra 431517, India

reviews.text:
Best place to stay if you want a one or two day stay. Good, clean rooms with individual geyser available so no dependency on solar water.

They need to work just a little on their washroom cleanliness, needs more regular maintenance. Also, option for morning tea/coffee would be nice, instead of us asking for it.

Overall, would recommend.

We met Radheshyam Lodging which is an excellent and good quality lodging facility to stay in Ambejogai cities and the speaking manner of the owner and the speaking manner of the staff is good and good. We booked this hotel for two days and the rooms of the hotel are good and clean.  🙏🙏

Horrible experience ever. Rooms are not at all cleaned and full of mosquitoes, bed sheets were so dirty… though we booked it 4 days ago and it was confirmed but after arriving there at night they were saying we don’t have booking with your name then we had to show them that we did book it … had to wait at least for an hour to get washroom and room cleaned. Even the staff was very rude and behaved like we were staying for free of cost… they don’t provide basic amenities also.. parking isn’t available … had ordered tea that too was pathetic..

Worst Experience Ever
Dirty Rooms, Dirty Bedsheets, Dirty Bathrooms, arrogant Staff
We booked it 4-5 days before Arrival
Still on Arrival at 10pm they kept us on waiting for Half n Hour & they Cleaned Room after Our Complaint
Staff is behaving like we are Staying there for Free
Room is full of Mosquitoes
No basic amenities Provided by Hotel
Like Soap, towels, No Parking available to this Hotel you have to park your cars on that small roads
The Owner is not there in Hotel still without seeing anything he is saying from phone that Rooms are Good no issues in it so do not Complain.
I am not going to Recommend this hotel to anyone

reviews.text: It was the dirtiest hotel room I've seen in my entire life. It's cheap and the cost is as low as 500 Rupees. But the quality of the room is very bad. The toilets stink. The rooms looked like they were never cleaned since they started the hotel. It's my kind of request to only stay when you are in extreme need of accommodation. Never take your family there.
